channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Deep Security Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro, Inc. -- Trend Micro Deep Security Agent

item.title: CVE-2023-52338|2024-06-20T19:25:59.609Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20deep%20security%20agent
item.description:
A link following vulnerability in the Trend Micro Deep Security 20.0 and Trend Micro Cloud One - Endpoint and Workload Security Agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-36358|2024-06-11T14:26:48.573Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20deep%20security%20agent
item.description:
A link following vulnerability in Trend Micro Deep Security 20.x agents below build 20.0.1-3180 could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-52338|2024-01-23T20:43:13.069Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20deep%20security%20agent
item.description:
A link following vulnerability in the Trend Micro Deep Security 20.0 and Trend Micro Cloud One - Endpoint and Workload Security Agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-52337|2024-01-23T20:42:58.280Z -- trend%20micro%2C%20inc. -- trend%20micro%20deep%20security%20agent
item.description:
An improper access control vulnerability in Trend Micro Deep Security 20.0 and Trend Micro Cloud One - Endpoint and Workload Security Agent could allow a local attacker to escalate privileges on affected installations.
Please note: an attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
